Basic Billing functions

Area
Inhouse billing staff
Primrose
Advantage
Billing functions
Create claims based on defined standards and following payer specifications.
Create claims based on defined standards and following payer specifications.
Neutral
Transparency
Having an in-house biller gives you direct access to billing information
We pride in being transparent, and you get real-time access to view reports through Dashboard or mobile app
Neutral
Patient calls
Taking patient calls takes up staff time
Primrose handles all incoming patient calls with questions on balance and takes payments over the phone. ¹
Neutral
Mail processing
Processing incoming mail takes up staff time
We set up a dropbox to receive and process all incoming mail, including EOBS. ¹
Neutral
Check depositing
Handling checks adds additional time to your busy schedule
Primrose deposits checks saving you trips to your bank ¹
Primrose
Appeals
If you have experienced staff, they get good at appeals over time.
Primrose has a dedicated AR team that specializes in their own domain and gain expertise in appeals. ¹
Primrose
Continuity
During this period of high staff turnover, if your billing staff leaves, your practice could be in a crisis.
Primrose uses a team-based approach with cross trained staff; if one staff leaves, it has no impact on the overall performance
Primrose
Revenue
Billing staff tend to focus on their day-to-day tasks
Over the years, we have developed multiple strategies to maximize your revenue. ¹
Primrose
Prior Auth
Billing staff will rely on your frontdesk staff to get prior authorizations
We get prior authorization for all tests, & hospital procedures. This can cut down your staff hours by 16 hours each week. ¹
Primrose
Coding
Billing staff are rarely coders as those are completely different skills. This leads to lost revenue and audits when physician codes complex surgery or procedure claims
We have experienced specialty coders for all hospital procedures and surgeries. ¹
Primrose
Bank reconciliation
Billing staff do not reconcile with the bank statement and a few missing checks could result in thousands of dollars in lost revenue
We reconcile bank statements with our records and track any missing payments.¹
Primrose
Test credits
Does not apply
We apply credit to cover your medication costs for Nuclear stress imaging
Primrose
Custom Reports
Billing staff do not have the ability or skillset to generate custom reports
Our dashboard breaks down revenue by main tests such as ECHO, Stress & Nuclear Imaging. We support custom report generation with our premium plans. See details here.
Primrose

¹ - feature is available only in our Premium & Enterprise plans. See our plans here

Area
Inhouse billing staff
Primrose
Advantage
Reminders
Add on feature to EMR; uses external vendors to send out reminders; additional fees apply
Built-in feature; Default with all plans; no additional fee
Primrose
Eligibility
Add on feature to EMR; uses external vendors to verify eligibility; additional fees apply
Default in Premium & Enterprise plan at no additional fee
Primrose
Estimation
Your frontdesk staff does not know or are reluctant to collect money upfront. Increased high deductible plans result in thousands of dollars being lost.
We estimate what the patient will owe at the time of the visit giving the frontdesk staff the confidence to collect. Fees apply*
Primrose
Checkin
EMR vendors do not have a way to collect copay
As a part of the check-in we collect copays and deductibles. Combining Estimation significantly improves your upfront collection for tests and procedures.
Primrose
Self service
Some EMR vendors allow patients to manage their appointments through a patient portal but utilization of portals by patients have proven to be low.
Along with reminders, we also allow patients to manage their own appointments.
Primrose
Messaging
Some EMR vendors allow messaging through a patient portal but utilization of portals by patients have proven to be low.
Our system allows you to message patients, send documents & images securely
Primrose
Prior Auth
EMR vendors do not support prior authorization.
We get prior authorization for tests, procedures and surgeries. Your savings will be significant as our staff takes up the workload ¹
Primrose
Reviews
EMR vendors do not remind patients to leave reviews leaving and your practice ends up losing patients
We remind patients to leave a reminder after their appointment to dramatically increase your Google reviews
Primrose

¹ - feature is available only in our Premium & Enterprise plans. See our plans here

Primrose is here to help you all the way

Our mission is simple: to enable the success of your practice. From day one, we make it easy to get up and running with Primrose. Once onboarded, our support team is ready to make sure that your success continues. Free for Primrose customers.

  • Dedicated team member for personalized services
  • Risk free moving all the data to our system
  • Contact us via phone or email

Your questions, answered

Answers to the most frequently asked questions.

Yes, we include all revenue from services, including patient collections, whether you collect it or we collect it

Yes, we give credit towards certain expensive medications/infusions based on the actual cost (invoice needed). Please check with us on your specific situation.

Yes, we do prior authorizations for all tests, procedures & surgeries as a part of our premium service; If you need prior authorizations done with a basic plan, see Cypress plans for a support team that can get your tasks done at a fraction of the cost of employing on-premise staff.

We raise our invoice on a monthly cycle

We obtain your prior consent and process all payments as ACH from your bank account.

No, we don’t accept credit card payments to keep processing costs down.

You would reach out to your account manager or open a ticket. We will charge your account until any open questions are resolved.
